sys_security_acl.description:
This access control allow tutor role individuals to edit End Date Time field only when the request status Requested.
So when the request status of record is different than requested , End Date Time will be Read Only.
sys_security_acl.name: x_314719_kiwi_student_request.end_date_time

sys_update_version.name: sys_security_acl_6efe0da507c850103032f1d08c1ed0df
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_security_acl"><sys_security_acl action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><admin_overrides>true</admin_overrides><advanced>false</advanced><condition table="x_314719_kiwi_student_request.end_date_time">request_status=requested^EQ<item endquery="true" field="" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value=""/></condition><description>This access control allow tutor role individuals to edit End Date Time field only when the request status Requested.

So when the request  status of record is different than requested , End Date Time will be Read Only.
